alert.note: Alert for Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 23 at 2:35PM MST until January 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...Western Pima County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Western Pima County Including Ajo, Organ Pipe Cactus National Monument
